Class PasswordField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.gui.PasswordField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyEditor, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, CustomPanelSupplier

    public class PasswordField
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.beans.PropertyEditor, CustomPanelSupplier
    Property editor widget that wraps and displays a JPasswordField.
    Version:
    $Revision: 12418 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
